thread.title: Genesis Energy, L.P. Sets Date for Release of Fourth Quarter and Year End Results and Conference Call

author: cnbc.com
title: Genesis Energy, L.P. Sets Date for Release of Fourth Quarter and Year End Results and Conference Call
text:
HOUSTON--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Genesis Energy, L.P. (NYSE: GEL) will announce its earnings for the fourth quarter and year ended December 31, 2017 on February 15, 2018, before the market opens.
Genesis Energy, L.P.’s Fourth Quarter and Year End Earnings Conference Call will be held Thursday, February 15, 2018, at 9:30 a.m. Central time (10:30 a.m. Eastern time). This call can be accessed at www.genesisenergy.com . Choose the Investor Relations button. For those unable to attend the live broadcast, a replay will be available beginning approximately one hour after the event.
Genesis Energy, L.P. is a diversified midstream energy master limited partnership headquartered in Houston, Texas. Genesis’ operations include onshore and offshore pipeline transportation, sodium minerals and sulfur services, marine transportation and onshore facilities and transportation. Genesis’ operations are primarily located in the Gulf Coast region of the United States, Wyoming and the Gulf of Mexico.
View source version on businesswire.com : http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180201005847/en/
Genesis Energy, L.P.
Bob Deere, 713-860-2516
Chief Financial Officer
Source: Genesis Energy, L.P.
